full_summary:
**Shipping and Storage Containers Tender Announcement**

# Solicitation Number: W8486-217638/A

* **Tender Closing Date**: August 23, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 31, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 22, 2023

## Background
The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for shipping and storage containers, and seeks qualified bidders to supply these items. The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price, following a competitive open bidding process.

## Contract Requirements
The required items are detailed as follows:

| Item      | Description                 | Quantity | Unit of Issue          |
|-----------|-----------------------------|----------|------------------------|
| 1         | Shipping and Storage Container | 120      | EA (or equivalent)     |
| 2         | Shipping and Storage Container | 20       | EA (or equivalent)     |
| 3         | Case, Electronic Communications Equipment | 10     | EA (or equivalent)     |
| 4         | Shipping and Storage Container Set, Electric-Electronic | 166     | EA (or equivalent)     |

Bidders proposing equivalent or substitute products must indicate the brand name, model, part number, and NCAGE (North American Industry Classification System).

## Tender Documents
The tender package includes the following documents:

* Attachment 1: RFP (Request for Proposal) Amendment 1 (English)
* Attachment 2: RFP Amendment 2 (English)
* Attachment 3: RFP Amendment 3 (English)
* Attachment 4: RFP Amendment 3 (English)
* Attachment 5: RFP Amendment 2 (French)
* Attachment 6: RFP (English)

## Tendering Process
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information
For further information and clarification, please contact Leslie Hawkins at leslie.hawkins@forces.gc.ca or (343) 572-2027.

### Note
The contract will be awarded based on the lowest price, following a competitive open bidding process. Bidders must ensure they comply with the tendering process and submission deadlines.
